refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: maxdb_stat returns a string containing several information about the MaxDB server running.

refsect1.title: Return values
refsect1.para: A string describing the server status. &false; if an error occurred.

refsect1.title: Example

example.title: Procedural style
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = maxdb_connect("localhost", "MONA", "RED");

/* check connection */
if (maxdb_connect_errno()) {
   printf("Connect failed: %s\n", maxdb_connect_error());
   exit();
}

printf("System status: %s\n", maxdb_stat($link));

maxdb_close($link);
?>
